alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 2:15AM PST until December 27 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, except up to 8 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph could result in blowing snow. * WHERE...In Oregon, Malheur County zone. In Idaho, Southern Twin Falls County and Western Magic Valley zones. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect breaks in snowfall today. Snowfall will increase tonight through Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
